Html:
How would one go about drawing an overlay image onto a map (a good example would be a radar image tile)?
I have the lat/lon coordinates of the corners of the image and am using FromLatLngToLocal() in the OnRender event to come up with the rectangle to paint to.

I am having two issues with this method though, one is more serious than the other:
1) When panning around the map with this method the image is not anchored to the map; instead it moves around the map as if its several thousand feet above the map (e.g. small pans are amplified: If the map is panned 10 pixels to the East the overlaying image actually moves 20 pixels)
2) This method does not properly paint the image to the map using the current projection. Instead the image is scaled to the pixel points and not projected on the map.

Is there an easy way to overcome both of these two issues?
Thanks
